an5.93:4.1: “Mendicants, there are five ways of declaring enlightenment.
an5.93:4.3: One declares enlightenment out of stupidity and folly.
an5.93:4.4: Or because of wicked desires, being naturally full of desires.
an5.93:4.5: Or because of madness and mental disorder.
an5.93:4.8: These are the five ways of declaring enlightenment.”
